doc.title: Memoirs of Dmentia

credit.role: Dmentia Divinyl/Cousin Earl/Professor Dr.Scotty/Officer Baloney Pony/Eva LaDeva/Mistress of Desires
Dr. Frankenweenie/Leather Daddy Bartender/Construction Joe/Cowboy Chris/Oil Can Sammy/The Lawn Ornament/The Big Pussy Kitty/The Lizzard of Zo

doc.plot: A mad scientist, Dr. Frankenweenie was bored and horny on a Saturday night, so he decided to create himself a hermaphrodite. He named her "Dmentia Divinyl". The creature escaped and became a domesticated prostitute in a small town called "Pennsy-Tucky, where she encounters various bizarre and dysfunctional people. Dmentia's psychologist, Professor Dr. Scotty, informs her to write her life events in a journal, which she narrates as we explore a world of side show freaks and mental disorders. Will Dmentia ever become a mother? An actress? Or meet her dream man? You must watch and see for yourself as we explore her dark and twisted world in "Memoirs of Dmentia."
